Entries.ShaneAnimalShop: Well, here you go.$6 [206]#$e#Here's to my finally getting a job that won't suck the soul outta me.$6#$e#...Not gonna lie, I'm actually really really excited.$h
Entries.ShaneGridballGame: So... uh, maybe we can go out again sometime?$6
Entries.JasBirthdayParty: Heh, looks like I've got some stiff competition in Jas's "favorite grown up" department.$6
Thanks for coming, {{Auncle}} @.#$e#I think we should have picnics every day!$h

Entries.Shane4Hearts: Thank you for your help, @...$3#$e#I just don't know what to do anymore.$2
Entries.ShaneGridballGame: Hi there, @. How have you been doing?#$e#So... how was that Tunnelers game you went to? Did anything interesting happen?#$b#Shane won't tell me anything about it.$2
Entries.JasBirthdayParty: Don't be a stranger now, dear. We are family, after all.$h

Entries.59443413/e 3910974/f Shane 2000/f Jas 15: distantBanjo/8 6/farmer -1000 -1000 1 Shane 5 5 1 Jas 6 5 3/skippable/showFrame Jas 22/pause 500/speak Jas "...so the little mermaid sank the invaders' fleet and saved the day. She let them all drown. The end."/pause 200/speak Shane "That was great, Jas!$h#$b#Your giant squid voice was pretty scary."/emote Jas 32/pause 200/speak Shane "Did you like the book?$6"/pause 100/speak Jas "Yeah! When I grow up, I wanna sink ships, too!$h"/pause 250/emote Shane 40/pause 250/speak Shane "Eh... Maybe you can work in the ship disposal industry someday.$6#$b#(Or maybe I should actually read storybooks before I buy them...)$3"/pause 250/speak Shane "Anyway, what do you wanna do next?$6"/pause 100/faceDirection Jas 3/pause 100/speak Jas "Can we have ice cream?"/pause 100/speak Shane "Aw c'mon, squirt. We're having dinner in a bit."/speak Jas "Please? I won't even add sprinkles."/speak Shane "Marnie doesn't want you spoiling your dinner, Jas."/speak Jas "Aunt Marnie isn't here right now."/pause 100/speak Shane "Okay, first of all, that's not how it works. Second, *I* don't want you spoiling your dinner, either."/pause 500/speak Jas "Well, *you* said that you can't always get what you want!$4"/pause 250/emote Shane 40/pause 1000/speak Shane "No."/pause 100/jump Jas 3/pause 400/textAboveHead Jas "Pleeease!"/jump Jas 3/pause 400/jump Jas 3/pause 400/speak Shane "Nope. Not happening."/speak Jas "But I'm hungry!$2"/pause 100/stopMusic/speak Shane "Hi, hungry! I'm dad!$h"/pause 500/speak Jas "...$3"/speak Shane "!!!$10"/pause 200/speak Jas "???$3"/speak Shane "!!!$10"/speak Jas "Huh..?$3"/pause 200/speak Shane "I uh...$10"/faceDirection Shane 3/playSound breathout/pause 200/playMusic distantBanjo/faceDirection Shane 1/speak Shane "You know what, I'll go grab the ice cream from the freezer. Just this once.$h"/pause 100/jump Jas 4/speak Jas "Yesss!$h"/pause 100/speak Shane "But no telling Marnie, all right?"/pause 100/speak Jas "Okay!"/pause 100/viewport move 0 1 6000/move Shane 0 1 1/faceDirection Jas 0/move Shane 1 0 2/move Shane 0 5 2/doAction 6 12/move Shane 0 3 2/move Shane -1 0 2/emote Shane 28/pause 1000/speak Shane "Sweet Yoba's jazz pants...$10#$b#I said that?$10"/pause 500/globalFade/end

Entries.3910674/f Shane 1000/e 611944: shaneTheme/-2000 -2000/farmer 18 18 1 Marnie 21 14 0 Jas 25 16 2 Shane -1000 -1000 2/addConversationTopic Shane4Hearts 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite shanePassedOut/viewport 22 8 true/pause 2000/speak Marnie "Shane?"/pause 2000/doAction 21 13/pause 500/move Marnie 0 -7 1/textAboveHead Marnie "Oh dear..."/doAction 21 13/removeTile 21 13 Buildings/removeTile 21 12 Front/move farmer 3 0 0/faceDirection Jas 3 true/move farmer 0 -10 1/faceDirection Marnie 2/pause 500/speak Marnie "@... Can you do something? He's out cold.$s"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/move farmer 3 0 0/faceDirection Marnie 1 true/move farmer 0 -1 1/pause 1000/speak Shane "buhhh...$7"/pause 2000/specificTemporarySprite waterShane/pause 250/playSound wateringCan/pause 1000/specificTemporarySprite waterShaneDone/warp Shane 25 7/textAboveHead Shane "Whaa..?!"/jump Shane/shake Shane 2000/showFrame Shane 18/pause 3000/showFrame Shane 0/move farmer -1 0 1/faceDirection Shane 3/speak Marnie "Shane! What's the matter with you? All you do anymore is mope around your room and drink beer!$s"/move Jas -4 0 0 true/pause 200/faceDirection Shane 2 true/pause 50/faceDirection Shane 1/emote Shane 12/shake Shane 1000/textAboveHead Shane "..."/pause 1500/speak Shane "You wouldn't understand..."/pause 1000/textAboveHead Marnie "I'm worried..."/move Jas 0 -8 1/speak Marnie "What's your plan? Don't you ever think about the future?"/faceDirection Shane 0/textAboveHead Shane "Plan?"/pause 2000/speak Shane "Hopefully I won't be around long enough to need a 'plan'..."/jump Jas/pause 500/shake Jas 10000/speed Jas 4/textAboveHead Jas "...*sob*..."/move Jas 0 10 2 true/faceDirection Marnie 2/emote Marnie 28 true/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Shane 1 true/pause 50/faceDirection Shane 2/pause 600/move Marnie 0 10 2 true/pause 1000/textAboveHead Shane "Jas..."/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 400/showFrame Shane 19/pause 1000/textAboveHead Shane "I'm sorry..."/pause 3000/faceDirection Shane 1 true/showFrame Shane 4/pause 500/showFrame Shane 35/playSound thudStep/shake Shane 4000/pause 2000/end
Entries.3910974/f Shane 1700/e 3910975/p Shane: shaneTheme/-2000 -2000/farmer -1000 -1000 1 Marnie 12 14 2 Jas 25 16 3 Shane -1000 -1000 0/skippable/showFrame Jas 22/viewport 13 14 clamp true/pause 2000/playSound doorClose/warp Shane 13 19/move Shane 0 -3 0/pause 500/speak Marnie "Hi Shane... you look unusually happy today."/pause 1000/speak Shane "You're right... I haven't felt this light since I was a kid.$h"/emote Marnie 8/move Marnie 1 0 2/speak Marnie "Let me guess... Gus had a clearance sale on canned beer?$u"/pause 500/playSound shwip/faceDirection Shane 1 true/pause 50/faceDirection Shane 2 true/pause 500/textAboveHead Shane "Good one..."/pause 500/showFrame Shane 19/pause 1000/speak Shane "No, actually. I've been drinking sparkling water instead of beer... and I feel great!$h"/pause 500/showFrame Shane 0/pause 200/faceDirection Shane 1 true/pause 50/faceDirection Shane 0/speak Shane "You know, I sometimes forget that I really do have friends, people that care about me.#$b#And it's okay for me to rely on them... it doesn't make me weak."/pause 500/emote Marnie 32/viewport move 1 0 6000/move Shane 4 0 2/textAboveHead Marnie "He looks sharp!"/move Shane 0 2 1/move Shane 4 0 0/move Shane 0 -2 1/speak Shane "Hi Jas. I've got something for you.$6"/pause 500/showFrame Shane 26/specificTemporarySprite jasGift/playSound coin/pause 500/showFrame Shane 4/emote Jas 8 true/move Jas -2 0 3/pause 800/playSound woodWhack/specificTemporarySprite jasGiftOpen/pause 500/showFrame Jas 24/playSound yoba/pause 2000/speak Jas "Th... These are real bunny-jewel slippers!!$h"/pause 1000/faceDirection Jas 3/speak Jas "B... But these are so expensive!$3#$b#How did you afford them?$3"/pause 1000/speak Shane "I've cut back on an expensive habit. I have a lot more spending money now!$h"/pause 1000/faceDirection Jas 1/textAboveHead Jas "Okay..."/pause 1000/speak Shane "Jas... I'm sorry about what happened before.#$b#I said some stuff that really hurt you, and I should have never let you hear that from me...$3"/pause 200/emote Jas 40/pause 1000/speak Shane "When I said those things... it's not because I wanted to leave you or hurt you. It's not your fault."/emote Shane 40/pause 1000/speak Shane "I wasn't feeling well because, uh... my head is sick, and it makes me feel sad and tired a lot... and..."/pause 500/emote Shane 28/pause 1000/speak Shane "Sorry, I barely understand it myself.#$b#It's hard for me to explain... but I'll tell you all about it when you want me to, okay?"/pause 500/speak Shane "Right now, I just need you to know that I'm working hard to get better.#$b#And it's okay if you're sad or scared or mad at me. Take as long as you need to feel how you feel.$6"/shake Jas 2000/pause 1000/speak Shane "I'm not going anywhere, squirt. I'm gonna work extra hard to be here for you.$6"/shake Jas 2000/pause 1000/speak Shane "Jas? You okay?"/pause 200/speed Jas 6/jump Jas/move Jas -1 0 3/showFrame Jas 23/positionOffset Jas -2 1/pause 10/positionOffset Jas -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Jas -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Jas -2 0/showFrame Shane 18/pause 10/positionOffset Jas -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Jas -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Jas -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Jas -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Jas -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Jas -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Jas -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Jas -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Jas -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Jas -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Jas -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Jas -2 1/pause 500/textAboveHead Jas "WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!!!"/faceDirection Shane 1/showFrame Shane 26/jump Marnie 4/faceDirection Marnie 1/emote Marnie 8/pause 750/speak Shane "It's okay, just let it out...$6"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -2000 -2000/speak Shane "...Do you want to put on your new bunny-jewel slippers?"/pause 500/speak Jas "*sob*... yes, please.$2"/pause 2000/end

Entries.233400001/e 2118991/e 191393/e 529952/t: distantBanjo/13 15/farmer -1000 -1000 0 Marnie 15 5 0 Shane 20 18 3/addConversationTopic ShaneAnimalShop 0/skippable/pause 1000/playSound doorClose/move Shane -4 0 3 true/warp farmer 13 19/move farmer 0 -1 1 false/speak Shane "Oh, hey, @.$6#$b#I just finished doing my chores. You wanna grab something to eat?$6"/move Marnie 0 6 2 true/emote farmer 32/pause 500/move Shane -3 0 2 true/move farmer 0 1 2 false/warp farmer -1000 -1000/playSound doorClose/doAction 15 12/move Marnie 0 2 2/speak Marnie "Shane, can I have a minute before you head out?"/textAboveHead Shane "Sure."/move Marnie -2 0 2/move Marnie 0 1 3/move Marnie -1 0 2/move Shane 0 -2 0/pause 500/playSound money/pause 500/move Marnie 1 0 2/speak Marnie "Here, take this."/playSound purchase/pause 250/playSound purchase/pause 500/emote Shane 8/pause 500/speak Shane "Uh... do you want me to get you something at the saloon?"/speak Marnie "Well, I won't say no to a slice of Gus's pumpkin pie, but you don't have to get me anything.#$b#That money's yours."/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 2 true/showFrame Shane 19/emote Shane 40/pause 1000/showFrame Shane 0/stopAnimation Shane/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 0/speak Shane "...Thanks, but you don't need to give me an allowance.$3#$b#I'm imposing on you enough as it is."/speak Marnie "It's not an allowance, Shane. It's your paycheck."/jump Shane/emote Shane 8/speak Shane "Huh?"/move Marnie 0 -1 1/move Marnie 2 0 2/move Marnie 0 3 3/faceDirection Shane 1 true/move Marnie -1 0 3 true/positionOffset Marnie 0 3/positionOffset Marnie 0 3/positionOffset Marnie 0 3/positionOffset Marnie 0 3/positionOffset Marnie 0 3/speak Marnie "I couldn't offer you a job before, what with the ranch's financial situation...$s#$b#But now that the JojaMart's closed down, orders for our products have been flooding in from the neighboring towns.#$b#I need a full-time ranch hand to help me keep up with them."/pause 1000/speak Marnie "You don't have to take the job, of course.#$b#It's just that you've already done so much to help around here, so it's only right that I compensate you for it."/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 2 true/showFrame Shane 19/emote Shane 40/pause 1000/speak Marnie "Well, what do you say?"/pause 1000/showFrame Shane 0/stopAnimation Shane/faceDirection Shane 1/positionOffset Shane 12 0/positionOffset Shane 12 0/animate Shane true true 500 34/playSound swordswipe/showFrame Marnie 16/textAboveHead Marnie "Oh!"/pause 500/showFrame Marnie 13/pause 2000/speak Shane "Of course I'm taking the job!$h"/stopAnimation Marnie/stopAnimation Shane/positionOffset Shane -8 0/positionOffset Shane -8 0/positionOffset Shane -8 0/pause 1000/emote Marnie 20/speak Marnie "Oh, I'm glad.$h#$b#I know the pay isn't much, but it's the best I can do right now."/speak Shane "Please, it's more than they ever paid me at JojaMart."/pause 400/speak Shane "Seriously though... I won't let you down."/pause 500/speak Marnie "I know you won't.$h#$b#Now go on, I think we've kept @ waiting long enough.#$b#Bring home a slice of pumpkin pie for me, all right?$h"/speak Shane "Marnie, I'll buy you the whole pie.$h"/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 2/textAboveHead Shane "Hey, {{PlayerName}}! Dinner's on me!"/pause 1500/move Shane 0 3 2 true/globalFade/viewport -2000 -2000/playSound getNewSpecialItem/message "Marnie's Ranch is now open 7 days a week!"/end

Entries.2128292/e 3900074/t 600 630/f Shane 2000: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Shane 64 18 0/pause 1500/skippable/speak Shane "Hey, @!$6"/pause 1000/speak Shane "Uh... So I got two tickets to the Tunnelers game tonight.$6"/pause 2000/speak Shane "If you want to come, meet me at the bus stop around 5pm.$6"/pause 1000/end
Entries.59443111/e 9581348/t 2200 2600/f Shane 2: none/-1000 -1000/farmer 64 16 2 Shane 0 0 0/skippable/warp Shane 68 17 0/viewport 64 15 true/pause 3000/playSound coin/pause 1000/speak Shane "There. No backing out now, Shane."/pause 1000/question fork0 "#Shane? What are you doing?#(Pretend not to see him.)"/fork ShaneHello/pause 500/playSound breathout/pause 1000/move Shane 10 0 1/pause 500/globalFade/mail ShaneTenHearts/end
Entries.ShaneHello: jump Shane 8/showFrame Shane 18/textAboveHead Shane "{{PlayerName}}!"/pause 1500/speak Shane "@, uh, I was... I--$10"/pause 250/faceDirection Shane 3/pause 250/speak Shane "I thought you were already asleep. I didn't think I'd run into you...$10"/pause 250/emote Shane 28/playSound breathout/pause 500/move Shane -4 0 0/pause 100/speak Shane "I was just dropping off this letter."/pause 1000/speak Shane "Um... can you--*gulp*$3"/pause 500/speak Shane "Wait till tomorrow to read it, okay?"/pause 1000/speak Shane "Okay, I'm... I'm gonna head home now.$3#$b#Goodnight, @.$6"/speed Shane 4/move Shane 14 0 3/globalFade/mail ShaneTenHearts/end
Entries.59443143/O Shane/f Shane 3000/t 2200 240: shaneTheme/-1000 -1000/farmer 0 0 0 Shane 1 1 2/skippable/warp farmer 65 18 3/warp Shane 65 15 2/faceDirection Shane 2/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 500/viewport 64 15/pause 500/move farmer -1 0 0/speak Shane "Hey, bud. How'd your day go?$6"/pause 200/emote farmer 56/pause 500/speak Shane "That's good..."/move farmer 0 -3 1/faceDirection Shane 3/showFrame Shane 34/positionOffset Shane -2 0/animate farmer false true 100 101/playSound dwop/pause 500/stopAnimation farmer/showFrame Shane 12/pause 1500/emote Shane 40/pause 1000/question fork1 "{{PlayerName}}... Can we talk? I just need to get something off my chest.#Sure.#Maybe some other time."/fork noShaneTalk/pause 500/speak Shane "Thanks..."/pause 1000/speak Shane "...$3"/pause 1000/speak Shane "Today was pretty bad for me.$3"/emote farmer 8/pause 200/speak Shane "Don't worry, nothing happened.#$b#It's just... everything's been so heavy.$3"/pause 1000/emote Shane 28/pause 1000/speak Shane "Honestly, I'm starting to think that I'll feel this way for the rest of my life.$s#$b#And sometimes...$s#$b#Sometimes, I still wish I could just end it all.$3"/stopMusic/pause 1500/faceDirection Shane 2/pause 1000/speak Shane "I can't, though. I won't.$3#$b#I don't want you to worry. I'm never gonna do anything like that again.#$b#There are people depending on me, you know? And there are lots of good things in my life."/playMusic SettlingIn/pause 500/speak Shane "I have you. And there's Jas, Marnie, the farm, the chickens... I have actual friends in town now, too.#$b#...There's no way I can just... leave.$3#$b#Even if I feel like I want to.$s#$b#There's no way I'm gonna just throw it all away."/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 3/pause 500/speak Shane "And I just wanna let you know that of all the good things keeping me here...#$b#You're my favorite.$6"/pause 1000/speak Shane "...Well, it's a tie between you and Jas, to be honest... I mean...$3"/pause 500/emote Shane 40/pause 500/speak Shane "Anyway, the point is that you matter to me. You know that, right?$6"/pause 500/emote farmer 20/pause 500/showFrame Shane 34/positionOffset Shane -2 0/animate farmer false true 100 101/playSound dwop/pause 2000/stopAnimation farmer/showFrame Shane 12/pause 1000/speak Shane "*sigh* Thanks for hearing me out...$6"/pause 500/speak Shane "We should probably get some shut-eye...#$b#Or do you want a snack first? I can heat something up for you if you want.$6"/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue Shane "Here, in case you wanna snack before bed.$6 [206 215]#$b#Goodnight, @.$6"
Entries.noShaneTalk: pause 1000/speak Shane "Yeah, sure. You're probably tired."/pause 1000/emote Shane 40/pause 1000/speak Shane "Uh... are you hungry? Here, I'll heat something up for you."/move farmer -1 0 1/move Shane -1 0 0/faceDirection Shane 0/pause 100/warp Shane 1 1 1/playSound doorClose/pause 2000/end dialogue Shane "Here, in case you wanna snack before bed. [206 215]#$b#Goodnight...$3"
Entries.59443124/O Shane/f Shane 3250/f Marnie 2: playful/-1000 -1000/farmer 64 16 2 Jas 64 18 0 Shane 0 0 0/skippable/viewport -1000 -1000/warp Jas 69 17/warp Shane -30 -30 2/viewport 64 15 true/playSound doorClose/move Jas -4 0 3/speak Jas "Good morning, {{Auncle}} @!$h"/emote farmer 32/move farmer 0 2 1/faceDirection Jas 3/speak Jas "Do you know what day it is today?"/emote farmer 8/pause 250/emote Jas 56/speak Jas "It's my birthday!$h#$b#Aunt Marnie is making a special lunch to celebrate, and"/playSound doorClose/showFrame Shane 0/warp Shane 64 15 2/pause 500/textAboveHead Shane "Jas?"/faceDirection Jas 0/faceDirection farmer 0/jump Jas 8/speak Jas "Uncle Shane!$h"/speed Jas 5/move Jas 0 -2 3/jump Jas 3/positionOffset Jas -12 1/positionOffset Jas -12 1/positionOffset Jas -12 1/showFrame Jas 23/textAboveHead Shane "Woah, kiddo!"/pause 1000/speak Shane "Well, good morning to you too!$h"/emote Shane 20/pause 750/faceDirection Shane 1/positionOffset Jas 3 -1/positionOffset Jas 3 -1/positionOffset Jas 3 -1/positionOffset Jas 3 -1/positionOffset Jas 3 -1/positionOffset Jas 3 -1/positionOffset Jas 3 -1/showFrame Jas 15/positionOffset Jas 3 -1/positionOffset Jas 3 -1/positionOffset Jas 3 -1/positionOffset Jas 3 -1/positionOffset Jas 3 -1/positionOffset Jas 3 -1/showFrame Jas 12/stopAnimation Jas/move farmer 0 -1 0/move farmer -1 0 1/speak Shane "I'm pretty sure it's someone's birthday today, but I can't remember whose it is...$3"/textAboveHead Jas "Uncle Shane!"/pause 300/faceDirection Shane 3/speak Shane "Is it your birthday, @?$6"/speak Jas "No!!!$h"/faceDirection Shane 1/speak Shane "Hmmm... maybe it's %pet's birthday..."/textAboveHead Jas "UNCLE SHANE!!!"/jump Jas 5/pause 1000/speak Jas "It's MY birthday today!$h"/jump Shane/speak Shane "You're right, I can't believe I forgot!$10"/emote Shane 28/pause 100/speak Jas "You didn't forget, Uncle Shane. You're just teasing me.$4"/faceDirection farmer 2/animate farmer false true 100 102 103/speak Shane "Heh, I should've known you're way too smart for me to fool.$6"/speak Jas "That's right."/pause 1000/stopAnimation farmer/playSound breathout/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Shane "So kiddo, what do you wanna do today?$6"/speak Jas "I was just telling {{Auncle}} @ about how Aunt Marnie's making lunch.#$b#I came over to ask if you'll both meet us by the lake at 11. We're having pink cake!$4"/pause 200/speak Shane "Of course we'll be there, Jas.$6"/emote Jas 32/speak Jas "Yay! See you later!$h"/end dialogue Shane "That kid is something else, isn't she?$6"

Entries.ShaneTenHearts: Hey @,^I just needed to let you know that I love you. ^^   -Shane[#]Shane's Note

Entries.611944/f Shane 500/t 2000 2400: nightTime/-1000 -1000/farmer 33 18 2 Shane 34 25 2/skippable/addLantern 735 35 25 1/animate Shane false true 200 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 23 24 24 24 24 23 22 21 20 20 20 20/viewport 34 25 true/move farmer 0 7 2/pause 2000/speak Shane "Up late, huh?"/stopAnimation Shane/showFrame Shane 20/pause 1000/speak Shane "Here, have a cold one."/pause 500/showFrame Shane 25/pause 1000/question fork0 "#Thanks.#No thanks."/fork ShaneBeer/stopAnimation Shane/pause 1000/speak Shane "More for me, then."/showFrame Shane 20/pause 5000/showFrame Shane 20/speak Shane "Buh... Life."/playMusic echos/pause 4000/speak Shane "You ever feel like... no matter what you do, you're gonna fail?#$b#...Like you're stuck in some miserable abyss and you're so deep you can't even see the light of day?"/pause 2000/speak Shane "I just feel like no matter how hard I try... I'm not strong enough to climb out of that hole."/pause 3000/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 3000/stopAnimation Shane/faceDirection farmer 2/showFrame Shane 19/speak Shane "Welp.. My liver's beggin' me to stop. Better call it a night.#$b#See you around, @."/move Shane 0 -6 0 true/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Entries.ShaneBeer: playSound coin/showFrame 90/stopAnimation Shane/showFrame Shane 20/pause 5000/showFrame Shane 20/speak Shane "Buh... Life."/playMusic echos/pause 4000/speak Shane "You ever feel like... no matter what you do, you're gonna fail?#$b#...Like you're stuck in some miserable abyss and you're so deep you can't even see the light of day?"/pause 2000/speak Shane "I just feel like no matter how hard I try... I'm not strong enough to climb out of that hole."/pause 3000/farmerEat 346/pause 4000/speak Shane "Heh... fast drinker, huh? Someone after my own heart.#$b#Just don't make it a habit... you got a future ahead of you still."/pause 3000/stopAnimation Shane/showFrame Shane 19/speak Shane "Welp.. My liver's beggin' me to stop. Better call it a night.#$b#See you around, @."/move Shane 0 -6 0 true/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Entries.59443123/e ShaneBeer/f Shane 3500/t 2000: none/-1000 -1000/farmer 33 18 2 Shane 34 25 2/skippable/addLantern 735 35 25 1/viewport 34 25 true/playMusic nightTime/move farmer 0 5 2/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Shane 0/pause 500/speak Shane "Oh hey, chickadee.$6#$b#Wanna join me?$6"/move farmer 0 2 2/faceDirection Shane 3/animate Shane false true 150 12 13/positionOffset Shane -2 -1/positionOffset farmer 2 1/positionOffset Shane -2 -1/positionOffset farmer 2 1/positionOffset Shane -2 -1/positionOffset Shane -2 0/positionOffset Shane -2 0/positionOffset farmer 2 0/positionOffset Shane -2 0/positionOffset Shane -2 0/positionOffset farmer 2 0/positionOffset Shane -2 0/positionOffset Shane -1 0/positionOffset farmer 1 0/stopAnimation Shane/faceDirection Shane 2/pause 2000/speak Shane "I decided to take a walk before heading to bed. I guess my feet just brought me here."/pause 2500/speak Shane "Remember the first time we were here together?#$b#Because I don't really remember much about it... I was drunk as a skunk that night.$3#$b#All I know is that I was miserable, you were there, and I found out that you can knock back a drink faster than I can tell you to slow down."/emote farmer 40/pause 100/speak Shane "Heh, it's just one of the things I like about you.$6"/pause 2000/speak Shane "I never thought I'd stand here feeling like this. Like my life isn't a giant train wreck."/pause 3000/speak Shane "*sigh*... It's peaceful out here. I never really liked the quiet before.#$b#Well, I guess I did. But only because I was constantly hungover.$3"/pause 1000/speak Shane "Now, though... it feels good to just stand here and breathe it in.$6"/pause 1000/emote Shane 56/pause 2500/speak Shane "It's getting late, isn't it?$6#$b#Come on, @. Let's go home.$6"/pause 250/positionOffset farmer -4 -5/positionOffset Shane 4 0/speed farmer 2/move farmer 0 -6 0 true/speed Shane 2/move Shane 0 -6 0 true/emote farmer 20/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

But only because I was constantly hungover.$3"/pause 1000/speak Shane "Now, though... it feels good to just stand here and breathe it in.$6"/pause 1000/emote Shane 56/pause 2500/speak Shane "It's getting late, isn't it?$6#$b#Come on, @. Let's go home.$6"/pause 250/positionOffset farmer -4 -5/positionOffset Shane 4 0/speed farmer 2/move farmer 0 -6 0 true/speed Shane 2/move Shane 0 -6 0 true/emote farmer 20/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Entries.59443125/e 59443124/z spring/z fall/z wi: marnieShop/-1000 -1000/farmer 0 0 0 Shane 1 0 0 Jas 40 13 2 Marnie 39 12 3/addConversationTopic JasBirthdayParty 0/skippable/changeToTemporaryMap JasParty/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/warp farmer 47 14/warp Shane 48 13/positionOffset farmer -20 0/viewport 36 11 true/move farmer -8 0 3 true/move Shane -6 0 3 true/pause 1750/jump Jas 4/faceDirection Jas 1/textAboveHead Jas "You're here!"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0 true/faceDirection Marnie 1/pause 250/speak Shane "Happy birthday, Jas!$h"/move Marnie 2 0 2 true/speak Marnie "I'm glad you two could make it!$h"/speak Jas "Uncle Shane, I need to show you something!$h"/pause 250/emote farmer 8/pause 100/speak Jas "*giggle* It's a secret, {{Auncle}} @.$4#$b#Come on, Uncle Shane!$h"/speed Jas 4/move Jas 0 3 2 true/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 2/move Shane 0 1 3 true/faceDirection farmer 1 true/faceDirection Jas 0 true/speak Shane "Heh, well, it looks like I gotta escort our birthday girl. We'll be back in a bit, bud.$6"/showFrame Shane 34/positionOffset Shane -5 0/animate farmer false true 100 101/playSound dwop/pause 400/stopAnimation farmer/showFrame Shane 12/pause 500/faceDirection Shane 2/move Shane 0 2 3 true/faceDirection farmer 2 true/speak Shane "So what did you find, squirt?$6"/faceDirection Jas 1 true/jump Jas 5/speak Jas "Come on, it's this way!$h"/speed Jas 5/move Jas -18 0 3 true/speed Shane 4/move Shane -18 0 3 true/pause 500/faceDirection Marnie 3/pause 250/move Marnie -2 0 3 true/faceDirection farmer 3 true/textAboveHead Marnie "Be careful!"/pause 3000/emote Marnie 28/playSound breathout/pause 500/faceDirection Marnie 2 true/move Marnie 0 2 1 true/speak Marnie "I'm sorry she dragged him off like that. She's always just so excited to spend time with him."/pause 200/emote farmer 32/warp Shane -30 -30/pause 250/speak Marnie "...You know, Jas was over the moon when she found out that you and Shane were getting married.#$b#Your wedding was all she would talk about for weeks!$h#$b#It was good to see her so animated about something."/pause 500/speak Marnie "You know how she can be so withdrawn sometimes...$s"/stopMusic/emote Marnie 40/pause 500/speak Marnie "Things were... difficult for them. For both of them.$3#$b#You know how bad things got for Shane...$3#$b#Jas's father was his best friend. I'd known them both since they were children.$3#$b#And Jas was four when the accident happened. She still gets nightmares sometimes.$s#$b#I don't know if they'll ever really heal from what happened, but...$3"/pause 500/speak Marnie "They've both come so far. I never imagined that we could all be together like this."/pause 250/warp Jas 24 16/warp Shane 24 15/speed Jas 5/move Jas 16 0 0 true/move Shane 14 0 1 true/pause 1000/textAboveHead Jas "We're back!"/pause 1000/playMusic SettlingIn/speak Jas "*giggle* {{Auncle}} @, you'll never guess what we found!$h"/pause 250/faceDirection farmer 2 true/faceDirection Marnie 2 true/emote farmer 8/pause 100/speak Jas "Well, give it to {{ObjPro}} already, Uncle Shane!"/move Shane 4 0 3 true/pause 2100/addObject 41 15 402/pause 1000/speak Shane "Heh... Jas found a big patch of sweet peas.$6"/jump Jas 4/speak Jas "So I told him to give some to you.#$b#It's like what they do in the movies!$h"/emote farmer 32/pause 250/speak Shane "...$l#$b#*cough*$3#$b#...So, uh... who else are we waiting for? Is Vincent coming too?$6"/pause 250/speak Jas "Nope! He and Miss Penny already celebrated with me yesterday. We went looking for shells at the beach.#$b#So today is just for family.$4"/emote farmer 20/pause 250/speak Marnie "Well, let's go and eat before the ants get to all our food!$h"/jump Jas/textAboveHead Jas "Can I have some cake?"/move Jas 0 -3 0 true/pause 500/move Marnie 0 -2 3 true/move Shane 0 -4 3 true/speak Shane "That pizza does look really good...$6"/move Shane -3 0 3 true/move Jas -2 0 0 true/emote farmer 32/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/message "Jas told us all about what she was learning at her tutoring sessions.#Later, Marnie admitted that she just bought all our food from the saloon.#It was a lot of fun!"/end

Entries.9581348/e 2128292/t 1600 1800: continue/-1000 -1000/farmer 12 19 0 Shane 13 10 2 Alex 12 13 0 Gus 9 11 1 Pam 10 10 2/viewport 12 11 clamp true/addConversationTopic ShaneGridballGame 3/skippable/move farmer 0 -4 0 rue/move Alex 0 -4 0 true/proceedPosition Alex/playSound thudStep/warp Alex -100 -100/move farmer 0 -1 0/move Shane 0 1 2/speak Shane "Hey, there you are!$6#$b#I'm glad you decided to come. We should get going...$6"/move Pam 2 0 0/move Pam 0 -1 0/warp Pam -100 -100/playSound thudStep/move Gus 3 0 0/move Gus 0 -2 0/faceDirection Shane 3 true/playSound thudStep/warp Gus -100 -100/move farmer 0 -4 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/playMusic none/pause 800/playSound busDriveOff/pause 4000/changeToTemporaryMap Stadium false/speak Shane "We're almost there..."/pause 1500/playSound glug/pause 500/speak Shane "*gulp* ...pre-game nerves...$10"/pause 1000/playMusic Stadium_ambient/warp farmer 19 19/faceDirection farmer 2/positionOffset farmer 0 16/warp Alex 14 12/faceDirection Alex 2/warp Gus 30 14/faceDirection Gus 2/warp Shane 22 12/pause 3000/advancedMove Shane false 0 7 -2 0/viewport 22 18 clamp true/proceedPosition Shane/faceDirection Shane 2/speak Shane "Here, I got you another soda..."/showFrame Shane 25/pause 1000/playSound coin/showFrame 90/showFrame Shane 0/pause 2000/farmerEat 184/pause 1000/animate Shane false true 200 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 23 24 24 24 24 23 22 21 20 20 20 20/pause 6000/animate Shane false true 400 0 30 0 30 0 31 0 31/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 1000/speak Shane "Hey, I've been meaning to say... $6#$b#Thanks for sticking with me through everything... my anxiety, depression... you know...$6#$b#You've been a really good friend to me.$6"/pause 2000/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 4000/speak Shane "Anyway...  it's your first gridball game, huh?"/pause 1000/speak Shane "$q -1 null#Well, what do you think?#$r -1 10 event_stadium1#Noisy... It makes me appreciate how peaceful it is back home.#$r -1 10 event_stadium2#Fun... Pelican Town seems really boring in comparison."/stopAnimation Shane/pause 100/jump Shane/showFrame Shane 18/pause 1000/speak Shane "Gahh!! Look, the Tunnelers are on the attack!$10"/showFrame Shane 0/pause 1500/pause 2000/jump Shane/pause 2000/showFrame Shane 34/positionOffset Shane -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Shane -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset forkShane -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Shane -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Shane -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Shane -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Shane -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Shane -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Shane -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Shane -2 0/pause 10/showFrame farmer 94/pause 800/showFrame farmer 0/pause 800/showFrame Shane 12/positionOffset Shane 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Shane 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Shane 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Shane 2 0/pause 1500/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection Shane 1/speak Shane "Oh!...$10"/faceDirection farmer 1/move Shane 1 0 1/speak Shane "Um... Sorry... I got carried away there.$10#$b#I don't know what got into me..."/pause 500/question fork0 "#(Kiss him.)#Can you ask me first next time?"/fork ShaneKiss/pause 100/faceDirection Shane 3/pause 100/speak Shane "Yeah, of course!$10#$b#I'm really sorry... that won't happen again."/question fork0 "#So are you gonna ask me or what?#Come on, let's watch the Tunnelers kick butt."/fork AskToKiss/pause 1000/speak Shane "Yeah, all right.$6"/move Shane -2 0 2/pause 3000/playSound Stadium_cheer/pause 500/showFrame Shane 31/jump Shane/textAboveHead Shane "Yes!"/jump Alex/jump Gus/textAboveHead Gus "Take that!"/jump farmer/pause 100/textAboveHead Alex "WOO!"/viewport move -1 -1 5000/pause 2000/globalFade/viewport -2000 -2000/pause 2000/playMusic none/pause 1000/speak Shane "Man, that was probably the best game I've ever seen.$h"/pause 2000/speak Shane "...I'm really happy that I got to watch it with you, @.$l#$b#Maybe we can... go out again sometime?$6"/pause 1000/speak Shane "Well... see you soon.$6"/pause 2000/end

Entries.AskToKiss: pause 2000/emote Shane 8/pause 1000/speak Shane "Uh...#$b#Can I kiss you?$6"/move farmer 2 0 1/pause 1000/animate farmer false true 100 101/positionOffset farmer 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset farmer 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset farmer 2 0/pause 10/positionOffset farmer 2 0/switchEvent ShaneKissEnd
Entries.ShaneKissEnd: showFrame Shane 34/specificTemporarySprite heart 22 18/pause 3000/viewport move -1 -1 5000/pause 3000/globalFade/viewport -2000 -2000/pause 3000/playMusic none/pause 1000/speak Shane "Well... that was definitely a good game.$l"/pause 2000/speak Shane "Oh, yeah... and we won, too.$l"/pause 1000/pause 1000/speak Shane "Well... see you soon.$6"/pause 2000/end

Entries.97/f Clint 750/t 1900 2300/d Tue Wed Thu: none/4 18/farmer 14 24 0 Clint 4 19 2 Emily 10 11 0 Gus 15 18 1 Shane 7 18 1/skippable/move farmer 0 -3 3/emote Clint 28/pause 500/move Clint 0 -1 3/move Clint -3 0 0/pause 500/playSound openBox/pause 150/playSound shiny4/pause 400/playMusic desolate/move Clint 3 0 2/move Clint 0 1 2/move farmer -3 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 3/faceDirection Shane 2 true/move farmer -3 0 3/textAboveHead Shane "Hey."/pause 200/faceDirection Shane 1 true/move farmer -3 0 3/faceDirection Clint 1/speak Clint "Hello, @... care to join me?"/pause 400/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Clint 2/speak Clint "Let me just go ahead and tell you what's on my mind.$u#$b#I have terrible luck with women, @...*sigh*$s#$b#I'm a nice guy if you get to know me, I swear!$u"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/emote farmer 28/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/speak Clint "You're good with people, @..."/speak Clint "$q 211 null#What advice can you give me?#$r 211 25 event_advice1#Impress women with your strength and charm#$r 211 25 event_advice1#Act crazy, to keep people guessing#$r 211 0 event_advice2#Just act natural... be yourself#$r 211 50 event_advice1#Treat women the same as men"/speed Emily 4/move Emily -6 0 2/speed Emily 2/move Emily 0 4 2/doAction 4 16/playSound openBox/stopMusic/move Emily 0 3 1/move Emily 1 0 2/move Emily 0 1 3/pause 400/pause 700/speak Emily "Hi Clint, what can I get for you tonight?$h"/pause 600/faceDirection Clint 1/pause 200/speak Clint "Yes!"/pause 300/speak Clint "Er.. I mean, I'll have the Big n' Cheesy. With extra sauce, please.$s#$b#...$u"/faceDirection Clint 3/faceDirection Emily 2/pause 300/faceDirection Clint 2/speak Emily "Hi @."/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Clint 1/speak Clint "Er... *ahem* Th...Thanks, Emily. For... taking my order.#$b#Um, Emily? I was...*gulp*... I was wondering...$h"/pause 300/faceDirection Emily 3/emote Emily 8/pause 400/speak Emily "Yes, Clint?$u"/pause 500/emote Clint 28/pause 1200/speak Clint "... nevermind.$s"/faceDirection Clint 0/playMusic sadpiano/pause 300/faceDirection Emily 2/pause 300/faceDirection Emily 3/pause 500/move Emily 0 -1 1/move Emily 1 0 1/faceDirection Shane 3/speak Emily "Hi, Shane! Here's your drink.$h"/pause 300/faceDirection Shane 1/pause 400/addObject 8 17 167 1/playSound woodyStep/pause 400/faceDirection Shane 3/pause 300/faceDirection Clint 1/speak Shane "Thanks, Emily!$h#$b#So... How's your shift coming along?"/speak Emily "It's fine! Thanks for asking, Shane!$h#$b#Do you have any new chicken stories for me?"/pause 600/emote Clint 28/pause 500/faceDirection Clint 2/pause 800/speak Clint "*sigh*$s#$b#I'm doomed...$s"/end warpOut
Entries.3917590/n saloonSportsRoom/O Alex: distantBanjo/-100 -100/farmer 31 20 0 Alex 32 7 0 Shane 33 8 0 Gus 34 8 0 Kent 35 8 0 George 36 7 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite gridballGameTV/viewport 34 7 true/move farmer 0 -13 1 true/pause 1000/textAboveHead Alex "Big play!"/pause 600/jump Gus/pause 2000/textAboveHead George "Score!"/pause 400/textAboveHead Alex "There we go!"/faceDirection Kent 3 true/faceDirection Gus 1 true/animate Gus false true 100 22/animate Kent false true 100 17/shake Gus 500/shake Kent 500/pause 500/textAboveHead George "Atta boy!"/pause 1000/stopAnimation Gus/stopAnimation Kent/faceDirection Kent 0 true/faceDirection Gus 0/pause 1000/faceDirection Alex 3/pause 400/speak Alex "Hey, @! You made it!$h"/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "So... what do you think?"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Alex 3/speak Alex "I've been thinking... You know how I used to dream of being an athlete someday?#$b#Well, my life ended up turning out a bit different... $9#$b#I'm happy, though, don't get me wrong!$h#$b#...But I thought it would be cool to have a place where us guys could hang out and watch the Sunday game. Gus liked the idea so much he offered me part of his back room!#$b#This way, I get to keep part of 'the dream' alive, in a small way."/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 600/faceDirection George 3/speak George "You did good, son. I could watch this at home, but coming here makes me feel young again!$h"/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "Thanks, Grandpa."/pause 500/speak Kent "I'm happy for an excuse to get out of the house, and take my mind off things."/faceDirection Alex 2/pause 100/textAboveHead Shane "Same"/pause 1200/speak Gus "I'm having a lot of fun. And it's good for business!$h#$b#Shane orders at least twice as many pepper poppers than he usually does..."/pause 100/faceDirection Shane 2 true/animate Shane false true 100 18/jump Shane/pause 500/textAboveHead Shane "Hey!"/pause 500/emote Alex 32/pause 2000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 400/message "It seems the guys have a new Sunday tradition."/pause 1000/message "5,000g well spent!"/pause 1000/end dialogue Alex "Thanks again for the money, @. It was a fun project for me, and all the guys seem happy with it!"

Changes.LogName: Animal Shop Events - Marnie is a Good Aunt Compat

Entries.3910674/f Shane 1000/e 611944: shaneTheme/-2000 -2000/farmer 18 18 1 Marnie 21 14 0 Jas 25 16 2 Shane -1000 -1000 2/addConversationTopic Shane4Hearts 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite shanePassedOut/viewport 22 8 true/pause 2000/speak Marnie "Shane?"/pause 2000/doAction 21 13/pause 500/move Marnie 0 -7 1/textAboveHead Marnie "Oh dear..."/doAction 21 13/removeTile 21 13 Buildings/removeTile 21 12 Front/move farmer 3 0 0/faceDirection Jas 3 true/move farmer 0 -10 1/faceDirection Marnie 2/pause 500/speak Marnie "@... Can you do something? He's out cold.$s"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/move farmer 3 0 0/faceDirection Marnie 1 true/move farmer 0 -1 1/pause 1000/speak Shane "buhhh...$7"/pause 2000/specificTemporarySprite waterShane/pause 250/playSound wateringCan/pause 1000/specificTemporarySprite waterShaneDone/warp Shane 25 7/textAboveHead Shane "Whaa..?!"/jump Shane/shake Shane 2000/showFrame Shane 18/pause 3000/showFrame Shane 0/move farmer -1 0 1/faceDirection Shane 3/speak Marnie "Shane, I'm worried about you... You're isolating yourself, and you've been drinking more...$s"/move Jas -4 0 0 true/pause 200/faceDirection Shane 2 true/pause 50/faceDirection Shane 1/emote Shane 12/shake Shane 1000/textAboveHead Shane "..."/pause 1500/speak Shane "You wouldn't understand..."/pause 1000/textAboveHead Marnie "I want to understand..."/move Jas 0 -8 1/speak Marnie "Shane, don't you have a plan? Do you ever think about the future?$s"/faceDirection Shane 0/textAboveHead Shane "Plan?"/pause 2000/speak Shane "Hopefully I won't be around long enough to need a 'plan'..."/jump Jas/pause 500/shake Jas 10000/speed Jas 4/textAboveHead Jas "...*sob*..."/move Jas 0 10 2 true/faceDirection Marnie 2/emote Marnie 28 true/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Shane 1 true/pause 50/faceDirection Shane 2/pause 600/move Marnie 0 10 2 true/pause 1000/textAboveHead Shane "Jas..."/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 400/showFrame Shane 19/pause 1000/textAboveHead Shane "I'm sorry..."/pause 3000/faceDirection Shane 1 true/showFrame Shane 4/pause 500/showFrame Shane 35/playSound thudStep/shake Shane 4000/pause 2000/end
Entries.3910974/f Shane 1700/e 3910975/p Shane: shaneTheme/-2000 -2000/farmer -1000 -1000 1 Marnie 12 14 2 Jas 25 16 3 Shane -1000 -1000 0/skippable/showFrame Jas 22/viewport 13 14 clamp true/pause 2000/playSound doorClose/warp Shane 13 19/move Shane 0 -3 0/pause 500/speak Marnie "Hi Shane... You look very happy today!"/pause 1000/speak Shane "You're right... I haven't felt this light since I was a kid.$h"/emote Marnie 8/move Marnie 1 0 2/speak Marnie "I'm really glad to hear that! What's changed?$h"/pause 500/playSound shwip/faceDirection Shane 1 true/pause 50/faceDirection Shane 2 true/pause 500/textAboveHead Shane "Well..."/pause 500/showFrame Shane 19/pause 1000/speak Shane "The truth is, I've felt motivated to take better care of myself. I'm drinking a lot less now."/pause 500/showFrame Shane 0/pause 200/faceDirection Shane 1 true/pause 50/faceDirection Shane 0/speak Shane "I want to get better. I've realized that I have family and friends who care about me.#$b#You, Jas and Emily, @... I want to be my best self for you guys..."/pause 500/emote Marnie 32/viewport move 1 0 6000/move Shane 4 0 2/textAboveHead Marnie "I'm so proud!"/move Shane 0 2 1/move Shane 4 0 0/move Shane 0 -2 1/speak Shane "Hi Jas. I've got something for you.$6"/pause 500/showFrame Shane 26/specificTemporarySprite jasGift/playSound coin/pause 500/showFrame Shane 4/emote Jas 8 true/move Jas -2 0 3/pause 800/playSound woodWhack/specificTemporarySprite jasGiftOpen/pause 500/showFrame Jas 24/playSound yoba/pause 2000/speak Jas "Th... These are real bunny-jewel slippers!!$h"/pause 1000/faceDirection Jas 3/speak Jas "B... But these are so expensive!$3#$b#How did you afford them?$3"/pause 1000/speak Shane "I've cut back on an expensive habit. I have a lot more spending money now!$h"/pause 1000/faceDirection Jas 1/textAboveHead Jas "Okay..."/pause 1000/speak Shane "Jas... I'm sorry about what happened before.#$b#I said some stuff that really hurt you, and I should have never let you hear that from me...$3"/pause 200/emote Jas 40/pause 1000/speak Shane "When I said those things... it's not because I wanted to leave you or hurt you. It's not your fault."/emote Shane 40/pause 1000/speak Shane "I wasn't feeling well because, uh... my head is sick, and it makes me feel sad and tired a lot... and..."/pause 500/emote Shane 28/pause 1000/speak Shane "Sorry, I barely understand it myself.#$b#It's hard for me to explain... but I'll tell you all about it when you want me to, okay?"/pause 500/speak Shane "Right now, I just need you to know that I'm working hard to get better.#$b#And it's okay if you're sad or scared or mad at me. Take as long as you need to feel how you feel.$6"/shake Jas 2000/pause 1000/speak Shane "I'm not going anywhere, squirt. I'm gonna work extra hard to be here for you.$6"/shake Jas 2000/pause 1000/speak Shane "Jas? You okay?"/pause 200/speed Jas 6/jump Jas/move Jas -1 0 3/showFrame Jas 23/positionOffset Jas -2 1/pause 10/positionOffset Jas -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Jas -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Jas -2 0/showFrame Shane 18/pause 10/positionOffset Jas -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Jas -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Jas -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Jas -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Jas -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Jas -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Jas -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Jas -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Jas -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Jas -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Jas -2 0/pause 10/positionOffset Jas -2 1/pause 500/textAboveHead Jas "WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!!!"/faceDirection Shane 1/showFrame Shane 26/jump Marnie 4/faceDirection Marnie 1/emote Marnie 8/pause 750/speak Shane "It's okay, just let it out...$6"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -2000 -2000/speak Shane "...Do you want to put on your new bunny-jewel slippers?"/pause 500/speak Jas "*sob*... yes, please.$2"/pause 2000/end
